pub(crate) trait VMDynamicFunction: Send + Sync {
    fn call(&self, args: &[Val]) -> Result<Vec<Val>, RuntimeError>;

    fn function_type(&self) -> &FunctionType;

    fn store(&self) -> &Store;
}
